argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_metuval | |- ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) -> ( metUnif ` D ) = ( ( X X. X ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( PsMet ` X ) ) -> ( metUnif ` D ) = ( ( X X. X ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = b -> ( 0 [,) a ) = ( 0 [,) b ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_imaeq2d | |- ( a = b -> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) = ( `' D " ( 0 [,) b ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_cbvmptv | |- ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) = ( b e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) b ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_rneqi | |- ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) = ran ( b e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) b ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_metust | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( PsMet ` X ) ) -> ( ( X X. X ) filGen ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( PsMet ` X ) ) -> ( metUnif ` D ) e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) |
